messages.message:
Facing this error, although this doesnt happen when theres less number of files. could be due to multiple files containing yapf changes?

```yapf with auto-staging...................................................Failed
- hook id: yapf
- exit code: 128

shared-utils/py-utils/ibllm/src/py/instabase/ibllm/model/ai_runtime_config/ai_runtime_config.py: line 1: yapf: command not found
shared-utils/py-utils/ibllm/src/py/instabase/ibllm/model/tasks/utils/extraction_utils.py: line 1: yapf: command not found
fatal: Unable to create '/home/owner/instabase/.git/index.lock': File exists.

Another git process seems to be running in this repository, e.g.
an editor opened by 'git commit'. Please make sure all processes
are terminated then try again. If it still fails, a git process
may have crashed in this repository earlier:
remove the file manually to continue.```

yeah seems you do not have `yapf` installed. You are making commits on Crafting perhaps?
Try to run `poetry run pip install yapf` and retry :slightly_smiling_face:
